sap.ui.generic.template.!description: SAPUI5 library that provides functionality used by Smart Template Applications.
sap.ui.generic.template.!helpDescription: SAPUI5 library that provides functionality used by Smart Template Applications.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.generic.template.AppComponent with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.UIComponent.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

init.!description: Initializes the AppComponent instance after creation.

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.generic.template.AppComponent.

createContent.!description: Creates the content of the component.

getApplicationController.!description: Returns the reference to the application controller instance that has been created by the AppComponent.

getConfig.!description: Returns the application configuration metadata that has been created and/or specified in the app descriptor.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.generic.template.AppComponent with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.UIComponent.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

exit.!description: Cleans up the component instance before destruction.

sap.ui.generic.template.AppComponent.!constructorDescription: Base class for application components used in smart template applications.

getTransactionController.!description: Returns the reference to the transaction controller instance.

getNavigationController.!description: Returns the reference to the navigation controller instance that has been created by AppComponent.
